statements: SELECT * FROM potential_drug_interactions
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM potential_drug_interactions
SELECT patient_id, prescription_date FROM potential_drug_interactions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT prescription_id, drug_name FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT * FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE '%aspirin%'
SELECT * FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin%' ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, drug_name FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND prescription_date < '2022-03-15';
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM potential_drug_interactions WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage='2 pills';
SELECT drug_name, prescribing_doctor FROM prescriptions ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='severe';
SELECT prescription_id_1, prescription_id_2, interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY prescription_id_1 DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT drug_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE prescribing_doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions ORDER BY drug_name ASC, dosage DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, drug_name, prescribing_doctor FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';

SELECT interactions.interaction_id, prescriptions.prescription_id, interactions.interaction_type FROM interactions INNER JOIN prescriptions ON interactions.prescription_id_1 = prescriptions.prescription_id;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, drug_name, dosage FROM prescriptions;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients;
SELECT prescription_id, prescriber FROM prescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, drug_name, prescriber FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_id = 3;
SELECT prescription_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE interaction_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drugs
SELECT drug_name, drug_id FROM Drugs WHERE drug_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT p.patient_name, d.drug_name FROM Patients p JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN Drugs d ON pr.drug_id = d.drug_id

SELECT pr.date_prescribed, i.interaction_description FROM Interactions i JOIN Prescriptions pr1 ON i.prescription_id1 = pr1.prescription_id JOIN Prescriptions pr2 ON i.prescription_id2 = pr2.prescription_id
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT drug_name, date_prescribed FROM Drugs JOIN Prescriptions ON Drugs.drug_id = Prescriptions.drug_id;

SELECT patient_name, drug_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Prescriptions.prescription_id = Interactions.prescription_id1;

SELECT patient_name, drug_name, interaction_description FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id JOIN Interactions ON Prescriptions.prescription_id = Interactions.prescription_id2;
SELECT * FROM drugs
SELECT drug_name FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC
SELECT patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drugs WHERE drug_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE date_prescribed >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT drug_name, drug_id FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_name, patient_id FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 100
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE drug_id IN (SELECT drug_id FROM drugs WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin')
SELECT interaction_description FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT drug_name, interaction_type FROM drugs INNER JOIN drug_interactions ON drugs.drug_id = drug_interactions.drug_id1
